title: Is DU a good option for Psychology Hons. or Amity University, Noida? - Quora

response.answer_text: The faculty is improving daily , and if you can manage good college , faculty will be good . Also , theres no comparison bw the two DU being a govt. University , its degree holding more value . The exposure you will get is outstanding , u are aware of the alumini of DU ? If not then search for it . Amity is just minting money whereas there is just mere fee of nearly 10k in DU for the whole year.

DU is anytime better than any other university in Delhi/NCR for the reasons that it's a govt university therefore you get better education at a minimal fee which may be less than your monthly pocket money. Wherein Amity is also Ok but it will cost you a bomb as compared to any other university. If you can get admission in DU that's awesome else you can go for Amity.
